title: [LOVE] Ep. 66: How to Create Sexual Chemistry w/ John Wineland
description:
Have you lost your desire for sexual intimacy with your partner?

Sit down with Ash this week as she talks with John Wineland, a speaker, teacher, and writer who specializes in sexual intimacy and relational communication.  John shares valuable steps to create sexual chemistry between you and your partner and the reasons why it may have become lost.

John walks through the value of feminine and masculine energy and how to move through each during the day.  This can be especially valuable with the women stepping into bossbabe roles, who may struggle to remove the masculine energy at the end of the workday.  If you are in a relationship where the sexual chemistry is drying out, John shares the root cause of why this is and how to work through it into clarity.  Don’t worry, if you are single or you are seeking a deeper understanding of sexual connection, there is enough juice in this episode to help you for the future.  Don’t forget to stick around for the post-episode notes, Ash talks about the value trust plays on intimacy and ways to gain it back!

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  • How to build your sexual chemistry.
  • The connection that your childhood has on attraction.
  • The value of masculine and feminine energy.
  • Insight into polyamory and what to prepare for in a polyamorous relationship.

 

Resources:

Getting the Love You Want by Harville Hendrix

 

Where to Find John Wineland:

Johnwineland.com

Instagram: @john_wineland

 

Promotion:

Ready to discover the best career path for you? Visit YouTurnPodcast.com/clarity
